AP mode IP of 192.168.1.240, Bridge mode IP of 192.168.1.241 :OEM: [[SerComm]] (YTL00D-1.6) {{WiFiCert|WFA9935|09/23/2010}} :see also [http://certifications.prod.wi-fi.org/pdf/certificate/public/download?cid=WFA12963 WFA12963 (WNHD3004v2)] Sold as a pair in ''3DHD Wireless Home Theater Networking Kit'' (WNHDB3004) ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31296-netgear-wnhdb3004-3dhd-wireless-home-theater-networking-kit-preview?start=1 ''Netgear WNHDB3004 3DHD Wireless Home Theater Networking Kit

Review'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] __NOTOC__
